string-array.item: Allow auto-add phone numbers from email subject into phonebook. If not checked, you will have to add phones manually into phone book before allowing application to send to them.

string-array.name: error_upgrade_for_international
string-array.item: Please upgrade to turn on international texting

string-array.name: FT_what_you_get_upgrade
string-array.item:
What you get:

 - You get full access to :

 settings access
 time interval setting
 Text sms internationally
 unlimited email account addition
 adding unlimited phone numbers
 the ability to set password lock for better security
 

 the ability to use subject handlers to:

 add numbers dynamically
 use name handles to send texts to associated numbers
 

 the supporting of future app development.

string-array.name: error_get_premium_message
string-array.item: Error, this feature can only be accessed if you are a premium user. Please upgrade first.

string-array.name: error_get_premium_message_limit_phone_ins
string-array.item: Sorry, you must be a premium user to add more phone numbers. Please upgrade first.

string-array.name: error_get_premium_message_limit_account_ins
string-array.item: Sorry, you must be a premium user to add more email accounts. Please upgrade first.

string-array.name: tutorial_name_handle
string-array.item:
Using the 'name' handle you must use

 Angle brackets "<" ">"

 Inside the Angle brackets you must use the name handle followed by 2 colons "n::" 

 You now have this in the subject area "<n:: >". 

 Inside the brackets you put the names of the people you want to text. 

 These names must be pre-existing in the phone book. 

 Please see the follow screenshot:

string-array.name: tutorial_phone_handle
string-array.item:
Using the 'phone' handle you must use

 Angle brackets "<" ">"

 Inside the Angle brackets you must use the phone handle followed by 2 colons "t::" 


 You now have this in the subject area "<t:: >". 

 Inside the brackets you put the phones of the people you want to text. 

 If the phones don't exist and you are a premium user, then the can be added automatically with the auto-add feature. 

 You can also give your phone number a name handle so that mohammed.ali#0633468211 is added into the phone book with the name handle of mohammed.ali instead of an person.unknown 

 Please see the follow screenshot:

string-array.name: tutorial_features
string-array.item:
For full control of who gets to send an SMS from your phone, we have added password protection to Risaala. 

To use password protection, you must put "pass#" inside your Angle brackets "<" ">" 
The password handle is "pass#" followed by the password you have set. 

 This password is set in the settings page and must take good care not to give this to anyone you don't trust. 
You must be a premium user to use this feature 
 Please see the follow screenshot:

string-array.name: about_src
string-array.item:
Welcome to Risaala 

This application was first developed as a means of mass communication with Engineers in the field.

 It takes emails and turns them into SMSs to be sent out to a collection of numbers, usually clients or engineers with jobs.

 By having one email address and many numbers on this application, one can better communicate a standard job to many engineers who are in the field. 

 We have found that this application has many uses.

 - a pizza parlour that may send its delivery personnel orders. It may also choose to send its customers their order confirmation. 

 - Sales office may send instructions to its sales team as to which client to see, when, and where.

 - general information to its client list.

 - a free SMS service for your social network. One email that will be forwarded instantaneously to your members without them having to check their emails. 


 We will be introducing many more functions and safeguards to this application and we hope you enjoy it.
 

 None of the users information is stored online by the developer and we have a policy of respecting privacy for it is our first duty and promise to users.

string-array.name: help_scr
string-array.item:
"

Help


For documetation and further help, please go to our website http://risaala.co.uk/risaala/


If you cannot find the necessary help there, you can always email us at admin@risaala.co.uk

"

string-array.name: tutorial_page1
string-array.item: Add the email address whose email you want to be read

string-array.name: tutorial_page2
string-array.item: Enter the numbers you want your emails to be sent to

string-array.name: tutorial_page3
string-array.item:
Switch on your internet.

 Risaala will read your email box and process them.

 It will then get all saved Phones associated with that email, synchronizing them.

string-array.name: tutorial_page4
string-array.item: Risaala will send that email to your stored phones via SMS.

string-array.name: tutorial_scr
string-array.item:
Tutorial


 To use Risaala,

 - add the email address whose email you want to be read

 - enter the numbers you want your emails to be sent to

 - connect to the internet

 - and let Risaala do its work.


To stop Risaala, remove the email or phones that you want to be stopped


We will be adding more functions that will allow you more control to you application.

string-array.item: Risaala could not add new Phone entry as you do not have the authority to do so.
Unable to set email to READ status
Could not find valid name entry in phone book.
Risaala could not find your name in the phone book. Risaala could not find %1$s

string-array.name: array_error_solutions
string-array.item: To activate auto-add, go to settings and check the box next to auto-add phones.
Please check password and network status.
Message must be plain text and not html when sending.
Please check your settings and try again.
Please check that you have spelt name correctly.
Please make sure that the name you are using as a handle is in the phone book. If not, you must first insert it into the phone book first.
This feature can only be accessed if you are a premium user. Please upgrade first.
